summary: This document contains the sworn testimony of an FBI Special Agent before a Federal Grand Jury in West Palm Beach regarding the Epstein case. The testimony focuses on a victim who was a minor at the time she met Epstein, and discusses her cooperation with authorities, legal concerns, and an immunity order.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: Testified before the grand jury about interviewing a victim in the Epstein case.

persons.name: Paula E. Angelocci
persons.context: Certified the transcript as a true record of the grand jury proceedings.

persons.name: Donald M. Middlebrook
persons.context: Issued the sealed immunity order for the witness.

connections.description: The Special Agent interviewed the victim regarding her interactions with Epstein.

events.title: Grand Jury Testimony
events.description: FBI Special Agent testified before the grand jury about a victim's interactions with Epstein and the legal proceedings surrounding her testimony.

events.title: Police Interview
events.description: The victim was interviewed by the Palm Beach Police Department in the fall of 2005, where she was initially cooperative but later informed she could face charges.

events.title: Immunity Order Issued
events.description: A sealed immunity order was issued for the victim, allowing her to testify without self-incrimination, except for perjury.

locations.name: Federal Building, U.S. Courthouse
locations.context: Location of the grand jury proceedings in West Palm Beach, Florida.

locations.name: Palm Beach County
locations.context: Jurisdiction where the Epstein case was being investigated.

keyFacts: A victim who was a minor at the time she met Epstein was interviewed by the FBI and police, initially cooperatively but later sought legal protection.
An immunity order was issued on April 16, 2007, allowing the victim to testify before the grand jury without self-incrimination.
The victim had previously been informed by police that she could face charges related to bringing girls to Epstein.
The testimony highlights the legal complexities and protections involved in gathering witness testimony in the Epstein case.
